mapper.select: SELECT * FROM RESTAURANT ORDER BY LIKECNT, STARCNT DESC
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM RESTAURANT WHERE STARCNT >= 4) ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE) WHERE ROWNUM <= 8
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM RESTAURANT WHERE RS_CATEGORY = #{category} ORDER BY LIKECNT, STARCNT DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 8
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM RESTAURANT WHERE RS_GU = #{address} ORDER BY LIKECNT, STARCNT DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 8
SELECT * FROM RESTAURANT WHERE RS_NAME LIKE '%'||#{word}||'%' OR RS_GU LIKE '%'||#{word}||'%'
SELECT RS_NAME "RESTAURANT_NAME", LIKECNT FROM RESTAURANT WHERE ROWNUM <= 10 ORDER BY LIKECNT DESC
SELECT RS_CATEGORY "CATEGORY", SUM(LIKECNT) LIKECNT FROM RESTAURANT GROUP BY RS_CATEGORY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESERVATION (user_id, rs_code,nickname, RES_DATE,res_time, seatcnt ) values(#{userId}, #{rsCode}, #{nickname}, TO_DATE(#{resDate},'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{resTime}, #{seatcnt})
mapper.select: SELECT R1.RS_CODE, R2.RS_NAME, R1.RES_DATE, R1.RES_TIME, R1.SEATCNT FROM RESERVATION R1 LEFT JOIN RESTAURANT R2 ON R1.RS_CODE = R2.RS_CODE WHERE USER_ID = #{id}
SELECT R.USER_ID, R.NICKNAME, R2.RS_CODE, R2.RS_NAME, R.RES_DATE, R.RES_TIME FROM RESERVATION R LEFT JOIN RESTAURANT R2 ON R.RS_CODE = R2.RS_CODE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESTAURANT (rs_code, rs_category, rs_name, rs_address ,rs_gu, rs_dong,phone, rs_desc, image1, image2, image3) values(#{rsCode}, #{rsCategory}, #{rsName}, #{rsAddress}, #{rsGu}, #{rsDong},#{phone},#{rsDesc},nvl(#{image1},'store.jpg'),nvl(#{image2},'store.jpg'),nvl(#{image3},'store.jpg'))
mapper.select: SELECT R.RS_CATEGORY, R.RS_NAME, R.RS_GU, PHONE, R.STARCNT FROM BOOKMARK B LEFT JOIN RESTAURANT R ON B.RS_CODE=R.RS_CODE WHERE USER_ID = #{id}
SELECT * FROM RESERVATION WHERE USER_ID = #{uid} AND RS_CODE = #{rcode}
